text: Polyalthia verrucipes is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to China.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Polyalthia verrucipes. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== verrucipes Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polyalthia verrucipes
